== Addon ==
Folder Name of the WoW-Addon or of the Main-Addon if the WoW-Addon has [Glossar#SubAddon SubAddons]

== Mapping ==
Relation between an [Glossar#bAddon Addon] and a [Glossar#Site Site]

== Site ==
An WebSite which hosts WoW-Addons (like curse, wowinterface)

== !SubAddon ==
A Folder which is related to another [Glossar#Addon Addon]
